TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RoutingBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class RoutingBehavior Implements IServiceBehavior

Docs.summary: Defines the routing behavior, which is used to configure the destination endpoints, filters and filtering options to be used during routing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> registers all of the run-time components used by the routing service, including the channel initializer, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension>.

MemberSignature.Value: public RoutingBehavior (System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration routingConfiguration);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration routingConfiguration) cil managed
Public Sub New (routingConfiguration As RoutingConfiguration)
public: RoutingBehavior(System::ServiceModel::Routing::RoutingConfiguration ^ routingConfiguration);
new System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior : System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration -> System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified routing configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> registers all of the run-time components used by the routing service, including the channel initializer, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension>, which uses the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>.
